name: registration-confirmation-clearer
description: Scheduled lambda that clears outdated registration confirmations

scripts.test:unit: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run compile && mocha './build/src/**/*.spec.js' --timeout 2000 --exit
scripts.test:unit:coverage: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run compile && nyc mocha './build/src/**/*.spec.js' --timeout 2000 --exit
scripts.test:unit:windows:coverage: SET "NODE_ENV=test" && npm run compile && nyc mocha './build/src/**/*.spec.js' --timeout 2000 --exit
scripts.test:component: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run compile && mocha './build/test/component/**/*.spec.js' --timeout 5000 --exit

author: Jakub Stanislawczyk
